snippet: Monday’s highlights from around the web include a tale of Google’s quest to take the steering wheel out of your hand. Plus, reaction to YouTube’s site being down and an argument for why young people aren’t the harbingers of the next big...
abstract: Monday’s highlights from around the web include a tale of Google’s quest to take the steering wheel out of your hand. Plus, reaction to YouTube’s site being down and an argument for why young people aren’t the harbingers of the next big thing.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: On Google's Driverless Car, and Poking Fun at Downed YouTube
